## SearchParameterField.fetchEntities property

Indicates whether or not to return the [AutocompleteResult.relatedItem](./answers-headless.autocompleteresult.relateditem.md) associated with the autocomplete result.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchEntities: boolean;
```
